translation:

"data protection is not just a right, it's a duty! 🚫💻 how can we still talk about protecting our personal data when we upload it ourselves on social media platforms? 🤷‍♂️ anyone can access our photos, names, and addresses at any time. #dataprivacy #privacy #socialmedia"

in this post, i'm criticizing the fact that people often upload their personal information such as photos, names, and addresses on social media platforms, which makes it accessible to anyone. this contradicts the idea of protecting personal data and privacy. i'm using the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #socialmedia to reach a wider audience and make my post more discoverable.
